ext_description.p: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is a type of . The shape of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is dependent both on the passage that is within the shape of the land (where that passage is included for the purpose of connecting the component terminal to a trace on the substrate) and on the size of the terminal that is going to be resting on the board. A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is an interface to a PCB or to a PWB, and therefore includes an external access mechanism.
ext_description.note: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land principally provides a location for the solder joint.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the words by which the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is known. It shall be equal to 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land'.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land as its . This relationship is for external access only.
specifies the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land.
specifies the role of the for the Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_land.

ext_description.note: A Component_termination_passage_and_contact_size_dependent_non_functional_land principally provides a location for the solder joint.

ext_description.p: A Contact_size_dependent_land is a type of whose shape is dependent on the size of the contact area of the that will be joined to the Contact_size_dependent_land in the assembly.
ext_description.example: Figure 1 is a detail that illustrates the Contact_size_dependent_land in relationship to the terminal that mates with it.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the words by which the Contact_size_dependent_land is known. It shall be equal to 'contact size dependent land'.
specifies the role of the for the Contact_size_dependent_land.

ext_description.p: A Land is a type of . A Land may be a , a , a , a , or a . A Land helps compose a or a .
ext_description.note: In the context of this standard, a Land may be external or internal to the interconnect.
ext_description.example: Figure 2 illustrates the relationship of a Land to the other elements of a construction known in the domain as a padstack.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Land as its . There shall be one or more for a Land. This relationship is for internal access only.

ext_description.p: specifies the primary role of the for the Land.
ext_description.note: The allows an application to discover the derived_from for the Land through the .. path.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the words by which the Land is known. It shall be equal to 'functional land'.
specifies one role of the for the Land. The value of this attribute need not be specified.

A Non_functional_land is a type of whose implementing is not also being composed by other instances of . A Non_functional_land may be one of a , a , a , an , a , or a .
the words by which the Non_functional_land is known. It shall be equal to 'non functional land'.

specifies an inverse relationship that specifies that the existence of the Non_functional_land is dependent on the existence of the that specifies the Non_functional_land as its . There shall be one or more for a Non_functional_land. The access_mechanism is only provided for support of plated passages within the lateral geometric boundary of the Non_functional_land.
specifies one role of the for the Non_functional_land.
specifies one role of the for the Non_functional_land. The value of this attribute need not be specified. An alternate_land_definition overrides the derived_from if it is provided.

ext_description.p: A Non_functional_land_interface_terminal is a type of included to identify the interface available for attachment in the next level of assembly.
ext_description.note: Use of this capability occurs when a member of references a member of Non_functional_land_interface_terminal to assign a relationship to an . A Non_functional_land_interface_terminal shall only be associated to types of established for the purpose of interface attachment.

A Non_functional_land_join_terminal is a type of that is included in a design to support the description of the relationship between the and a plated passage that implements a connection to a feature on a different member of than the member of the Non_functional_land_join_terminal is associated with.
